ModMetaData.name: Lighter Than Fast
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
Add 5 races from Faster Than Light : - Engi, poor at combat, yet skilled builders - Mantis, fast, feared fighter, poor builder - Rockmen, slow, lot of hp, fireproof - Slug, xenophobe, high psychic resistance - Zoltan, glows, generates power, explodes upon death
Dependencies: - Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
More Faster Than Light in RimWorld: - Crystal - Clone Bay - Teleporter
